description: The DOCS_RCVD_RES_INFO table contains information about compiled received results such as result time, procedure, status and specimen type.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of received documents.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RESULT_INST_CMP_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the result was collected or resulted.

columns.name: RES_PROC_NAME_CMP
columns.description: The free text name of the procedure.

columns.name: RES_PROC_CMP_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the procedure to which this result was mapped. This column links to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: RESULT_ENC_ID_CMP
columns.description: The unique ID of the encounter during which the order took place.

columns.name: RESULT_KEY_CMP
columns.description: The unique key that links other result information to this order.

columns.name: RES_STATUS_CMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result status category ID for the received information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: RES_ABN_CMP
columns.description: The value that indicates whether this result was flagged as abnormal or normal.

columns.name: RSLT_SPECIMEN
columns.description: Information about the specimen source/type as sent by the outside organization.

columns.name: RSLT_UNSUCC_FLG_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a result was deemed an unsuccessful attempt


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unsuccessful Attempt


Documented on Wrong Patient

columns.name: RSLT_UNSUCC_INST_COMP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the result unsuccessful flag was set
